Message:
I still don’t know how to feel
about what happened.

Should I be angry...?
Should I be sad...?

everything I have inside me
is all thanks to my brother.

To him, everything
might’ve been one big lie...
But to me, everything was real.

I lift my head to
look up at the sky.

If I didn’t, the waterworks
would have started.

Thank you for all the
kindness you gave me.

One by one,
the raindrops that hit
my face begin to cease.

Light slowly seeps through
the dark clouds.
